GameServer

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameServer.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation of tank in the game consisting of all of its components such as location , bullets , moveThread and speed . Handles tank moving and bullet shooting .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tank(java.lang.String color, MapHandler mapHandler)
      Generates a new tank instance and sets random location for its initial location .

    • Method Summary
